title: Convert HTML to PDF and Return via Webhook using CustomJS API

readme:
![workflow.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/workflow_804820ed4c.png)!

# n8n Workflow: HTML to PDF Generator

This n8n workflow converts HTML content into a styled PDF and returns it as a response via a webhook. The workflow receives HTML input, processes it using CustomJS's PDF toolkit, and sends back the resulting PDF to the original webhook requester.

[@custom-js/n8n-nodes-pdf-toolkit](@custom-js/n8n-nodes-pdf-toolkit)

## Features:

  * **Webhook Trigger** : Accepts incoming requests with HTML content.
  * **HTML to PDF Conversion** : Uses CustomJS to transform HTML into a PDF.
  * **Response** : Sends the generated PDF back to the webhook response.



## Requirements:

  * **Self-hosted** n8n instance
  * A **CustomJS API key** for HTML to PDF conversion
  * **HTML content** to be converted into a PDF



## Workflow Steps:

  1. **Webhook Trigger** :

     * Accepts incoming HTTP requests with HTML content.
     * This data is passed to the next node for processing.
  2. **HTML to PDF Conversion** :

     * Uses the **CustomJS** node to convert the incoming HTML into a PDF document.
     * You can customize the HTML content to match the design requirements.
  3. **Respond to Webhook** :

     * Sends the generated PDF as a binary response to the original webhook request.



* * *

## Setup Guide:

### 1\. Configure CustomJS API

  * Sign up at [CustomJS](https://www.customjs.space).
  * Retrieve your API key from the profile page.  
![image.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/image_afd7ead671.png)
  * Add your API key as n8n credentials.  
![image.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/2_c0fb963201.png)



### 2\. Design Workflow

  1. **Create a Webhook** :

     * Set up a webhook to trigger the workflow when HTML content is received.
  2. **Prepare HTML Content** :

     * The incoming request should include the HTML content you wish to convert into a PDF.
  3. **Configure HTML to PDF Node** :

     * Use the **HTML to PDF** node to convert the provided HTML into a PDF.
     * The node uses the HTML input to generate a PDF using the CustomJS API.
  4. **Respond with the PDF** :

     * The **Respond to Webhook** node will send the generated PDF back to the original requester as a binary response.



* * *

## Example HTML Input:
    
    
    <h1>Hello CustomJS!</h1>
    <h2>CustomJS provides the missing toolset for your no-code projects</h2>
    

## Result PDF

![image.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/image_8c8ec9172b.png)
readme_zh:
![workflow.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/workflow_804820ed4c.png) # n8n工作流：HTML转PDF生成器 该n8n工作流可将HTML内容转换为带样式的PDF，并通过Webhook返回响应。工作流接收HTML输入，使用CustomJS的PDF工具包进行处理，并将生成的PDF返回给原始Webhook请求者。 [@custom-js/n8n-nodes-pdf-toolkit](@custom-js/n8n-nodes-pdf-toolkit) ## 功能特性： * **Webhook触发器**：接收含HTML内容的请求 * **HTML转PDF**：使用CustomJS将HTML转换为PDF * **响应返回**：将生成的PDF通过Webhook响应返回 ## 系统要求： * **自托管**的n8n实例 * 用于HTML转PDF的**CustomJS API密钥** * 待转换的**HTML内容** ## 工作流步骤： 1. **Webhook触发器**： * 接收含HTML内容的HTTP请求 * 将数据传递至下一节点处理 2. **HTML转PDF**： * 使用**CustomJS**节点将HTML转换为PDF文档 * 可自定义HTML内容以满足设计需求 3. **响应Webhook**： * 将生成的PDF作为二进制响应返回给原始请求 --- ## 配置指南： ### 1. 配置CustomJS API * 在[CustomJS](https://www.customjs.space)注册账号 * 从个人资料页获取API密钥 ![image.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/image_afd7ead671.png) * 将API密钥添加为n8n凭证 ![image.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/2_c0fb963201.png) ### 2. 设计工作流 1. **创建Webhook**： * 设置Webhook在收到HTML内容时触发工作流 2. **准备HTML内容**： * 请求需包含待转换的HTML内容 3. **配置HTML转PDF节点**： * 使用**HTML转PDF**节点进行转换 * 该节点通过CustomJS API将HTML生成PDF 4. **返回PDF响应**： * **响应Webhook**节点将以二进制形式返回生成的PDF --- ## HTML输入示例： ```html

Hello CustomJS!

CustomJS为你的无代码项目提供缺失的工具集

``` ## 生成PDF效果 ![image.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/image_8c8ec9172b.png)
